CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "East District 1"), "East", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "East District 2"), "East", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "East District 3"), "East", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "East District 4"), "East", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "East District 5"), "East", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "West District 1"), "West", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "West District 2"), "West", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "West District 3"), "West", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "West District 4"), "West", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "West District 5"), "West", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.District__c, "Strategic"), "Strategic", "Other")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Region
